page.title: 10TRAFFIC SURVEY
page.content: When we did our traffic survey we went outside the school. It was a Wednesday, a busy day because there was a market in Market Drayton. We spent an hour doing our survey by counting all the cars, vans and lorries passing our school. We found out that of the vehicles we saw most were cars. There were no motor bikes which is a bit unusual. We counted up to 140 cars and 1 bus in an hour. We only get a bus service through our village on a Wednesday. We also did a speed test outside our school. We spaced ourselves out over 100m and timed the cars as they went by. Some cars were going 90km/h, which is very fast for a small stretch of road. Our village does have a speed limit.
